channel.title: Comments for page "The Black Altar"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Black Altar"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
As someone who has failed summoning 11 tails by a few seconds a couple times - anythoughts of giving it a BIT of leeway?
Veovis 11:14 8/8
1 minute leeway on each side added.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i suspect that it will either show the congratulations message, or give some redundant message about what the field looks like after the fact. Since the mirror shattered, i expect that the field's purpose is to collect bits andâ€¦. uh, what was the other one? yeah.

item.content:encoded: What happens if you return to the field after beating the phase?
